content: festive rose by ambah o brien i ve always been a big fan of roses faux and real the scent the romance the beauty i have a collection of fake roses where i have glued metal clips on i wear these in my hair as a brooch to make garlands and for decorating with this quick knit also makes a perfect gift festive rose yarn pattern notes rose fingering weight 70 yd/64 m the instructions below make a good size rose approximately 4 5 /11 5 cm across leaf dk weight 8 5 yd/7 8 m not including the leaf use smaller/larger needles and lighter/heavier yarn to make yourself a smaller/larger version yardage will vary across the different needles weights rose us 5/3 75 mm note keep your rose yarn overs loose as the project can tighten up when leaf us 6/4 mm purling these through the back of the loop notions rose optional clip locking stitch marker cast on 20 sts and purl one row tapestry needle sewing needle and row 1 rs k1 yo k1 repeat to end + 19 sts 39 sts thread row 2 ws p1 p1 tbl p1 repeat to end row 3 8 repeat row 1 2 three more times 77 153 305 sts abbreviations row 9 k2 ssk k16 k2tog repeat to last 3 sts k3 -
